title: "AI ethics efforts are flawed until we address one harmful human trait"
excerpt: "AI ethics efforts are blooming and making great strides forward but, of course, those efforts are being driven by humans and humans are flawed. This natural bias will be reflected in AI ethics standards unless there is real and effective representation worldwide."
